news.title: 安德鲁王子被曝向爱泼斯坦泄露机密
news.title0: Andrew shared confidential information with Epstein as trade envoy, files suggest
news.content: 最新文件显示，安德鲁王子在担任贸易特使期间，曾向已定罪性犯罪者爱泼斯坦泄露官方访问行程及机密投资信息。
news.content0: Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor appears to have knowingly shared confidential information with Jeffrey Epstein from his official work as trade envoy in 2010 and 2011, according to material in the latest release of files in the US seen by the BBC.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 伊朗诺贝尔和平奖得主再获刑七年半
news.title0: Iranian Nobel laureate handed further prison sentence, lawyer says
news.content: 伊朗法院以“集会与共谋”及“宣传”罪名，判处人权活动家、诺贝尔奖得主纳尔吉斯·穆罕默迪额外七年半监禁。
news.content0: Nobel Peace Prize winner Narges Mohammadi has been handed further prison sentences of seven-and-a-half years by an Iranian court, her lawyer has said.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 日本首相高市早苗闪电选举大胜
news.title0: Japan's PM Takaichi on course to win snap election by landslide
news.content: 日本首相高市早苗领导的执政联盟在闪电选举中赢得压倒性胜利，获得议会多数席位，为其推行保守议程铺平道路。
news.content0: Japan's ruling party, led by Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi, is on course to win Sunday's snap election by a landslide.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 伦敦新泳池开业六周即关闭引众怒
news.title0: Frustration as new pool closes weeks after opening
news.content: 伦敦南部耗资巨大的新泳池开业仅六周便因维护问题关闭，导致当地游泳俱乐部每月损失约500英镑，会员流失。
news.content0: A not-for-profit swimming club in south London says it is losing about £500 a month after a brand new council pool closed six weeks after opening.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 爱泼斯坦文件再揭全球权贵名单
news.title0: Who is in the Epstein files?
news.content: 美国最新公布的爱泼斯坦调查文件，揭示了更多全球富豪、政要与这位已定罪性犯罪者的联系，名单持续加长。
news.content0: The list of some of the world's most rich and powerful people with ties to late sex offender Jeffrey Epstein has lengthened, after the US government released millions of new files from its investigation into the disgraced financier.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 小成本同志剧《激烈竞争》成全球爆款
news.title0: No big names. No big budget. But Heated Rivalry is a big hit
news.content: 一部讲述冰球运动员禁忌之恋的加拿大低成本剧集《激烈竞争》意外走红全球，捧红素人主演，创下收视纪录。
news.content0: A few months ago Connor Storrie and Hudson Williams were both working as waiters. Now they are the stars of Heated Rivalry, one of the most talked about shows in the world.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 新西兰清真寺枪击案凶手欲推翻认罪
news.title0: Christchurch shooter seeks to overturn guilty plea
news.content: 2019年新西兰基督城清真寺枪击案凶手塔兰特本周出庭，试图以狱中“非人道”待遇为由，撤回其认罪并上诉。
news.content0: A white supremacist who killed 51 people at two New Zealand mosques will appear in court this week to try to withdraw his guilty plea.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 布里斯班公布23亿澳元奥运主场馆设计
news.title0: Plans for $2.3 billion stadium ignite debate in 2032 Olympics host city
news.content: 澳大利亚布里斯班公布2032年奥运会主场馆设计方案，耗资23亿澳元，灵感源自当地民居，引发保护主义者争议。
news.content0: Officials in Brisbane, Australia, have revealed plans for 2032’s Olympic stadium: a $2.3 billion venue inspired by the state’s typical suburban homes, known as “Queenslanders” — residential architecture that may be familiar to fans of Brisbane-based cartoon, “Bluey.”
news.author: CNN

news.title: 泰国大选：保守派政党意外获胜
news.title0: Seeking Stability, Thai Voters Decisively Reject Progressive Party
news.content: 泰国大选结果出炉，保守派政党为泰党意外击败进步派的人民党，赢得议会多数席位，反映选民对稳定与现状的偏好。
news.content0: It boiled down to a choice between two starkly different visions of Thailand’s future: one dominated by nationalism, respect for the monarchy and defense of the status quo, the other by promises of change and true democracy.
news.author: NYTimes
